author: cdhunt
body:

# PR Summary

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body:
@cdhunt appreciate the work, but we had already merged a SVG version here: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/13160

I don't think we need the eps file version.

comments.author: cdhunt
comments.body: Okay. This PR came in 2 days earlier. Was there something else about this PR that was unacceptable?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
@cdhunt Sorry, we have many opened PRs and perhaps Steve took the top but pulled later.

Thanks for your contribution!

title: Add vector files for Chibi Avatar
